item.title: Using Logback to manage Application Logs
item.description: Log Rolling/Rotation Time Based Max History Size and Time Based Max Size Capacity logging policy Acheiving based on time and size - with date+incremental index each file should be at most 20 MB, keep 30 days of history but at most 1GB References https://logback.qos.ch/access.html https://dennis-xlc.gitbooks.io/the-logback-manual/content/en/chapter-4-appenders/logback-core/rollingfileappender/size-and-time-based-rolling-policy.html

item.title: My Competitive Coding Setup
item.description: Sublime Text Editor Sublime Text Sublime Text Sublime Input Plugin Sublime Snippet Visuals https://cfviz.netlify.app/ CFAnalytics Extension Shell Utilities # Prepare practice set from solved questions find . -type f -name "*.cpp" | shuf -n 5 # Revise topic from notes find . -type f -name "*.md" | shuf -n 1
